resources.string: Most craft breweries. For example, Samual Adams is still considered a micro brewery.
An extremely small brewery which typically only distributes locally.
A regional location of an expanded brewery. Ex. Sierra Nevada’s Asheville, NC location.
A beer-focused restaurant or restaurant/bar with a brewery on-premise.
A very large brewery. Likely not for visitors. Ex. Miller-Coors.
A brewery in planning or not yet opened to the public.
A bar. No brewery equipment on premise.
A brewery that uses another brewery’s equipment.
Similar to contract brewing but refers more to a brewery incubator.
A location which has been closed.
Permission for making phone call was not granted.\nYou can go to settings and grant the permission.
Phone call cannot be performed.\nPlease make sure that your device has phone calls support.
Webpage cannot be open.\nPlease make sure that you have a browser installed on your device.
Cannot show on map.\nPlease make sure that you have a maps app installed on your device.
